original_title: Postal workers to go on 48-hour token strike
original_body_lines: The postal workers have decided to resort to a 48-hour token strike from 04.00 p.m. today (Dec. 10), the United Postal Trade Unions’ Front says.
The Co-convener of the association Chinthaka Bandara said that more than 27,000 postal workers will join the relevant strike.
